dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold, high-risk actions to maximize gains.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security over potential for higher returns.

dimensions.label: Growth Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin believes that abilities can be developed and will actively work to improve themselves.
Your FarTwin has a fixed mindset, believing that their abilities are innate and unchangeable.

dimensions.label: Technical Savviness
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle technical tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly skilled and proficient in using technology to solve problems.
Your FarTwin has limited experience with technology, but is eager to learn and improve their skills.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly creative and enjoys expressing themselves through various art forms.
Your FarTwin prefers to analyze and evaluate information before creating or expressing themselves.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new concepts?

options.description: Your FarTwin is a visual learner, preferring to understand and absorb information through images and videos.
Your FarTwin is an auditory learner, relying on sound and music to help them understand and retain information.

dimensions.label: Social Connection
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form and maintain relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly social and enjoys meeting new people and forming connections.
Your FarTwin prefers to maintain a smaller social circle and may feel overwhelmed by large groups or events.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges and competitions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold, competitive actions to achieve success and prove themselves.
Your FarTwin prefers to work with others, building strong teams and networks to achieve shared goals.
